item.title: Are Americans a People with a Creed, or a Creed-Made People?
item.description: An argument from JD Vance’s nomination speech continues to stir debate.

item.title: A Blueprint for Ukrainian Surrender
item.description: The draft proposal represents a betrayal for Ukraine and a humiliation for the West.

item.title: Trump’s Terrorist Designation of Muslim Brotherhood Sends Right Message
item.description: Though it isn’t a sweeping designation for the entire organization, the administration has taken a good first step.

item.title: Ken Burns Is Completely Wrong About the Iroquois
item.description: The Iroquois confederation wasn’t even a democracy. Leaders were selected by women elders, whose status was hereditary.

item.title: The James Comey and Letitia James Cases Go Away, for Now
item.description: Comey’s pending motions could be key.
